security: This document pertains to sensitive operational matters, including damage assessment and recovery efforts following a disaster. Disclosing details about "DOV 31 LE CORCOSTANT" and associated estimates, along with references to operational priorities like 'Labjo et J.C.', could reveal ongoing activities and compromise operational effectiveness.
summary: A classified message discussing a CENTE SECTEMIC and ELECTRICAL ESTIJE for a disaster at DOV 31 LE CORCOSTANT with reference to SCALICE and PALLARS. It also references a priority cover status for Labjo et J.C..
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET classified message, dated November 16, likely from the Director, references a seismic and electrical damage estimate (ESTIJE) for a disaster that occurred at "DOV 31 LE CORCOSTANT" based on the inputs of "SCALICE" and "PALLARS." It also discusses operational priorities, indicating a need for 'priority cover status for Labjo et J.C.', suggesting an operation requiring protection or concealment.
title: CENTE SECTEMIC and ELECTRICAL ESTIJE for disaster at DOV 31 LE CORCOSTANT; Priority cover status for Labjo et J.C.
